# pytest-cocotb-fusesoc

[Pytest][] plugin to integrate [FuseSoc][] with [Cocotb][].

[Pytest]: https://docs.pytest.org
[FuseSoC]: https://fusesoc.readthedocs.io
[Cocotb]: https://www.cocotb.org
